name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: System Engineer with 10+ years of experience in network technologies and cloud services, proficient in **Microsoft Teams**, **Skype for Business**, **Direct Routing**, **Trunking**, **Anynode**, and **Office 365**. Skilled in deploying and managing environments on **Linux** distributions such as **Debian** and **Ubuntu**, with a strong service orientation and teamwork abilities. Excellent communication skills in both German and English, facilitating collaboration across diverse teams. Previously, I delivered high-performance software solutions in healthcare and finance using modern technologies like **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Experienced in full stack development with frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and **Node.js**, alongside backend services with **FastAPI** and **Django**. Adept at building cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, emphasizing secure, maintainable solutions that adhere to compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS. Passionate about leveraging technology to drive real-world impact and enhance system performance.
